title: Instagram to now flag potentially offensive captions, in addition to comments
text: Earlier this year, Instagram launched a feature that would flag potentially offensive comments before they’re posted. Now, the social media platform is expanding this preemptive flagging system to Instagram’s captions, as well.

title: Battle Over Censorship and Communication Matters for Facebook Stock
text: Facebook stock has been a winner in 2019, creating a global network for communication that could either free or destroy the world.

title: Artificial Intelligence Stocks To Buy And Watch Amid Rising AI Competition.
text: When looking for the best artificial intelligence stocks to buy, investors should expand their search to unexpected fields. Salesforce.com and Trade Desk are among AI stocks on IBD's radar.
